com.srch2.android.http.service

Class UpdateResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.srch2.android.http.service.UpdateResponse

  • public final class UpdateResponse
extends Object
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of an update task.

    When any of the method calls to update a record or a set of records into an index ( mIndexable.update(JSONObject recordToInsert), Indexable.update(JSONArray recordsToInsert) or the corresponding static calls in the SRCH2Engine) are made, the SRCH2Engine will forward the update request to the SRCH2 search server; after the SRCH2 search server finishes executing, it will notify the SRCH2Engine of the status of the completed update task. The SRCH2Engine will pass this information through the StateResponseListener callback method onUpdateRequestComplete(String indexName, UpdateResponse response) where the UpdateResponse response is this object.

    If there were no errors in any of the JSONObject(s) representing record(s), the return value of getSuccessCount() will match the number of submitted JSONObjects. Any failures to update (missing or incorrect type for one of the defined schema fields, for instance) will be reflected in the value of getFailureCount().

    In the event of a failure to update one or more records, inspecting the value of getRESTfulResponseLiteral() will contain the reason for the failure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FAILED_TO_CONNECT_RESPONSE_CODE
      Indicates the SRCH2 search server was unavailable to process a request.
      static int INVALID_COUNT
      Indicates the InfoResponse was unable to be formed from the JSON response from the SRCH2 server upon performing an info command.
      static String IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE
      Indicates the SRCH2 search server was unavailable to process a request.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getExistRecordUpdatedSuccessCount()
      Utility method for determining the number of JSONObjects, representing records to update, that already existed in the index and updated successfully.
      int getFailureCount()
      Utility method for determining the number of JSONObjects, representing records to update, that failed to be updated.
      int getNewRecordInsertedSuccessCount()
      Utility method for determining the number of JSONObjects, representing records to update, that didn't exist in the index and insert successfully.
      int getRESTfulHTTPStatusCode()
      For each task executed by the SRCH2 search server, the server will return a HTTP status code of the completed request.
      String getRESTfulResponseLiteral()
      For each task executed by the SRCH2 search server, the server will return a RESTful response in for the form a JSONObject.
      int getSuccessCount()
      Utility method for determining the number of JSONObjects, representing records to update, that were updated successfully.

        public static final int INVALID_COUNT
        Indicates the InfoResponse was unable to be formed from the JSON response from the SRCH2 server upon performing an info command. Has the constant value -1.

        Indicates the SRCH2 search server was unavailable to process a request.

        Has the constant value of -1.

      • IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE

        public static final String IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE
        Indicates the SRCH2 search server was unavailable to process a request.

        Has the constant value of "Connection failed without known cause".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public String toToastString()
        Convenience method for outputting to toasts.
        Returns:

      • getRESTfulHTTPStatusCode

        public final int getRESTfulHTTPStatusCode()
        For each task executed by the SRCH2 search server, the server will return a HTTP status code of the completed request. Calling this method returns this status code.
        Returns:
        the HTTP status code as returned by the SRCH2 search server

      • getRESTfulResponseLiteral

        public final String getRESTfulResponseLiteral()
        For each task executed by the SRCH2 search server, the server will return a RESTful response in for the form a JSONObject. Calling this method will return the literal of this JSONObject.

        This method may return the value of IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE if the SRCH2 search server was unavailable.
        Returns:
        the RESTful response literal as returned by the SRCH2 search server
